definition.text: This is a minimalist workspace you may use to start from a clean slate.

paragraphs.text: The basic system components including the Masters Trading Mine and the Candles Data Mine.
The BTC-USDT Market installed on the Binance exchange.

You may switch to a different market by changing the configuration of the assets under the Exchange Assets node, and you may switch to a different exchange by changing the configuration of the Crypto Exchange node. You may find the configuration of other exchanges in the Tested Exchanges topic.
